src:
Južna Afrika šampion sveta!
02 Nov 2019, 12:29 by Milos
Reprezentacija Južne Afrike novi je šampion sveta u ragbiju.
Južnoafrikanci suu spektakularnom finalnom duelu u Jokohami nadigrali Englesku rezultatom 32:12 (12:6). Junak trijumfa bio je Andre Polard, koji je postigao 22 poena.
Južna Afrika je po treći put postala prvak sveta u ragbiju (prethodni titule osvojene su 1995. i 2007. godine).
Novi Zeland je zauzeo treće mesto nakon pobede protiv Velsa rezultatom 40:17 (28:10)
text:
South Africa World Champion!
02 Nov 2019, 12:29 by Milos
The South African national team is the new rugby world champion.
In a spectacular final match in Yokohama, the South Africans outscored England by 32:12 (12: 6). The hero of the triumph was Andre Polard, who scored 22 points.
South Africa became the rugby world champion for the third time (previous titles were won in 1995 and 2007).
New Zealand finished third after winning against Wales by 40:17 (28:10)
